Section.name: About ASIST
Section.description:
Amrita Sai Institute of Science & Technology (ASIST), an Autonomous institution affiliated to JNTUK, A.P. and approved by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) was established in the year 2007 under the auspices of Amrita Sai Educational Improvement Trust. The institute is also accredited by the NAAC with ‘A’ grade of its quality in technical education. For the last 11 years, the College has tremendously been excelling in all its verticals viz. Engineering, Management, Research, and Development. Sharp focus on quality education, sensible training, and solid research have turned Amrita Sai Institute of Science & Technology into a premier Technical Institution ensuring 100% placement in a wide range of companies.
The institute offers B. Tech, M.Tech., MBA and MCA programs in various specializations. It also offers Diploma courses in Engineering. B. Tech is a full-time four- year course. MBA, MCA, and M. Tech courses are for the duration of two-year while Diploma course is available for three years.
Eligibility:
Note: AP ICET is an Integrated Common Entrance Test conducted to provide admission in MBA and MCA courses in the state of Andhra Pradesh.
The institute also offers Diploma courses in two specializations like Electrical and Electronics Engineering and Mechanical Engineering. The minimum eligibility criteria is a class 10th pass from a recognized board.
Amrita Sai Institute of Science and Technology AP EAPCET Cutoff 2024 is out. The table given below shows the cutoff for Round 1.
ASIST Placements are known to have a 100% placement record. The placement cell is regularly associated with the department of English and Mathematics to enrich the students with the latest communication, aptitude skills with appropriate training. Regular practice of Mock interviews and Group discussions to enhance the student employability skills.
In the year of 2018, Four Companies have visited ASIST Krishna for Placements and have selected 150 students and still continuing.
